item.title: Grumpus add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If we knew what it was we were doing, it would not be called research, would it?" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by Nathaniel Hawthorne
item.description: "Happiness is like a butterfly which, when pursued, is always beyond our grasp, but, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you." -- Nathaniel Hawthorne

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by Seneca
item.description: "While the fates permit, live happily; life speeds on with hurried step, and with winged days the wheel of the headlong year is turned." -- Seneca

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by Henry Kissinger
item.description: "The task of the leader is to get his people from where they are to where they have not been. " -- Henry Kissinger

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by Galileo Galilei
item.description: "I do not feel obliged to believe that the same God who has endowed us with sense, reason, and intellect has intended us to forgo their use." -- Galileo Galilei

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by Edward O. Wilson
item.description: "One planet, one experiment." -- Edward O. Wilson

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by Andre Gide
item.description: "Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore." -- Andre Gide

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by Christopher Morley
item.description: "There is no mistaking a real book when one meets it. It is like falling in love." -- Christopher Morley

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "I figured that if I said it enough, I would convince the world that I really was the greatest." -- Muhammad Ali

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by Lord Chesterfield
item.description: "Young men are apt to think themselves wise enough, as drunken men are apt to think themselves sober enough." -- Lord Chesterfield

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by Phyllis Bottome
item.description: "Luck enters into every contingency. You are a fool if you forget it -- and a greater fool if you count upon it." -- Phyllis Bottome

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by Jules Renard
item.description: "I am never bored; to be bored is an insult to one's self." -- Jules Renard

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by Desiderius Erasmus
item.description:
"In regione caecorum rex est luscus.
(In the land of the blind, the one-eyed man is king.)" -- Desiderius Erasmus

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by Robert Louis Stevenson
item.description: "Saints are sinners who kept on going." -- Robert Louis Stevenson

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by Maria Robinson
item.description: "Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending." -- Maria Robinson

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Everything must be made as simple as possible. But not simpler." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by Marcel Proust
item.description: "The real act of discovery consists not in finding new lands but in seeing with new eyes." -- Marcel Proust

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "We can't solve problems by using the same kind of thinking we used when we created them." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by Stephen R. Covey
item.description: "Most people do not listen with the intent to understand; they listen with the intent to reply." -- Stephen R. Covey

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by Richard Branson
item.description: "Train people well enough so they can leave, treat them well enough so they don't want to." -- Richard Branson

item.title: Grumpus add a quote by John Wayne
item.description: "Life's hard. It's even harder when you're stupid." -- John Wayne
